title: Senate Passes $778 Billion Defense-Policy Bill
sub_head: NDAA package establishes commission to investigate Afghanistan war, makes changes to military-justice system
body:
WASHINGTON—The Senate on Wednesday voted 89-10 to pass a $778 billion defense-policy bill that will establish a commission to investigate America’s longest war, and make historic changes to the military-justice system.
Next the bipartisan legislation heads to President Biden’s desk for his signature.
